text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Network Connectivity>
We are investigating connectivity issues to a single Availability Zone in the EU-CENTRAL-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Network Connectivity>
Between 5:39 PM and 5:49 PM PDT we experienced network connectivity issues for some instances in a single Availability Zone in the EU-CENTRAL-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
